summary:
Tony: so let me clear this.. You eat people but assholes people?
Eddie: uhem sure
Stephen: oh good I have a person for you to...
body:
Tony: so let me clear this.. You eat people but assholes people?

Eddie: uhem sure

Stephen: oh good I have a person for you to eat that is clearly an asshole.*goes up to Eddie and shows picture of Steve*

Tony: Stephen no!!

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: After Midnight
title: After Midnight
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Vj14Au

by justanotherpipedream

Tony is content living his perfectly normal life, with his perfectly normal job. He has his bots, his friends and his average sized apartment, what more could he ask for? Of course that’s when a demon shows up on his door, asking to make a deal.

What kind of demon goes by the name of ‘Bucky’ anyways?

Apparently, someone’s been capturing demons and forcing them into familiars against their will. Bucky was concerned that’s what happened to his demon friend and sometimes lover, Steve. Bucky, with a reluctant Tony’s help, work together to figure out what’s been happening to the demons all around the city.

Words: 1431, Chapters: 1/11, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Pepper Potts, Steve Rogers
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers/Tony Stark, Natasha Romanov & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Natasha Romanov
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Urban Fantasy, Alternate Universe - Witchcraft, Canon-Typical Violence, Implied/Referenced Torture, Blood Magic, Blood Drinking, Elemental Magic, Witch Tony Stark, Demon Bucky Barnes, demon steve rogers


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Vj14Au

summary: Awaken the Wolverine
title: Awaken the Wolverine
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2U1Nr7y

by SpartanAltego

“You were sent to kill me, my friend.” Charles smiles, in that curious little way that he would, trying to protect you from his pain. “And you, unfortunately, succeeded.”

In the year of 2017, mutant-kind lives in hiding as a nuclear Great War brews between expansionist America and communist China for control of the world’s resources. Awakening to a shattered mind and the blood of one of the greatest mutants to live on his hands, James Howlett must decide his nature as a warrior, a predator, and a leader if he is to fulfill his promise to the man who gave him back his life. It’s not the end of the world, but you can see it from here.

Words: 25084, Chapters: 4/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: X-Men - All Media Types, Fallout (Video Games), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: James “Logan” Howlett, Erik Lehnsherr, Raven | Mystique, Charles Xavier, Scott Summers, Bobby Drake, Warren Worthington III, Jean Grey, Kitty Pryde, Rogue (X-Men), Kurt Wagner, Caliban (Marvel), Alex Summers, William Stryker (Movieverse), Victor Creed, Romulus (Marvel), Hellfire Club (Marvel), Morlocks (Marvel), Logan (X-Men), X-Force (Team), Bolivar Trask, Jennifer Walters, Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, En Sabah Nur, Sentinels (X-Men)
  • Relationships: James “Logan” Howlett & Victor Creed, Erik Lehnsherr & Charles Xavier, Erik Lehnsherr/Raven | Mystique, Jean Grey/Scott Summers, James “Logan” Howlett & X-Force (Team), Logan (X-Men)/Kitty Pryde
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe, POV Second Person, Roleplaying Character, Roleplay Logs, Families of Choice, Redemption, Action/Adventure, Drama, Science Fiction, Mood Setting Music


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2U1Nr7y

summary: Tony is content living his perfectly normal life, with his perfectly normal job. He has his bots, his friends and his average...
caption:
Tony is content living his perfectly normal life, with his perfectly normal job. He has his bots, his friends and his average sized apartment, what more could he ask for? Of course that’s when a demon shows up on his door, asking to make a deal.

What kind of demon goes by the name of ‘Bucky’ anyways?

Apparently, someone’s been capturing demons and forcing them into familiars against their will. Bucky was concerned that’s what happened to his demon friend and sometimes lover, Steve. Bucky, with a reluctant Tony’s help, work together to figure out what’s been happening to the demons all around the city.

Chapter One | Chapter Two | Chapter Three

The lovely @letsallsleepoverwork asked for a witch and demon au for their @marveltrumpshate gift, so here it is!

It’s primarily Winteriron with small bits of stuckony in the end. Happy reading!

tony stark deserves a happy ending
summary:
No one:
Marvel: let me fucking end the audience.
Please let this not be true, I swear I don't have the strength to watch anybody...
body:
No one:

Marvel: let me fucking end the audience.

Please let this not be true, I swear I don’t have the strength to watch anybody die, especially Tony.

summary: To the biggest dork in Hollywood, and a true Iron Man. He will always be our hero, and the king of the MCU.  Happy Birthday RDJ....
caption:
To the biggest dork in Hollywood, and a true Iron Man. He will always be our hero, and the king of the MCU.

Happy Birthday RDJ. Thank god you were born. This world would be a little less happy without you in it.
